tit.e: 大番頭 (Oban-gashira or Obanto: See below)

sen.j: 大番頭には、次のような意味がある。
sen.e: 大番頭 was provided with the following meanings:
Oban-gashira Or Obanto have the following meanings:
sen.cmt: 漢字は不要です。またより自然な流れにするため変更しました。was provided with → have
sen.e: Oban-gashira Or Obanto have the following meanings:

sen.j: 江戸幕府における職名の一つで、大番（おおばん）の長（頭）を務めるもの。
sen.e: Indicating a governmental post in the Edo bakufu, or the head of the Oban that was an organization of soldiers.
Indicating a governmental post in the Edo bakufu, or the head of the Oban that was an organization of soldiers.
Indicating a governmental post in the Edo bakufu, or the head of the Oban that was an organization of soldiers.

sen.j: 江戸時代、商家使用人のうち最高の地位にある番頭（ばんとう）の尊称。
sen.e: This was the honorific title for the Banto who was placed at the highest post of all employees at a merchant house.
This was the honorific title for the Banto who was placed at the highest post of all employees at a merchant house.
This was the honorific title for the Banto who was placed at the highest post of all employees at a merchant house.
